incidents.title: Acknowledged
incidents.description: There is a section of the side walk that needs to be removed and replaced immediately due to a tripping hazard.  The sidewalk protudes 4 inchs above the other side walk.  Patrians have been using my yard instead of using the side walk.  This needs to be replaced before someone trips.  the sidewalk can not be used by bikers, handicapped people in wheel chairs, or just walkers due to the sidwalk damage.

incidents.title: Acknowledged
incidents.description:
The view of the unsignalized crosswalk on Webster St at 22nd is blocked by the parking spot at the NW corner of Webster and 22nd. Cars and bicycles cannot see pedestrians entering the crosswalk, especially if there is a van or truck parked in this space. Figure 3B-21 of the 2009 MUTCD states that the no parking zone should extend 20 feet from the crosswalk to the last parking space.
http://mutcd.fhwa.dot.gov/htm/2009/part3/fig3b_21_longdesc.htm

Note the very short length of the red curb in the photo.
